website_summaries.verdict: A good quality press that features a ribbed design for giving burgers a seared look.
pros: Designed to make 4-inch regular patties, stuffed burgers, and sliders
Ribbed finish gives burgers a seared look
cons: Instructions are very minimal for this option

customer_reviews.title: Part with handle comes apart! Wish the instructions had made that more clear. Still happy with it! :)
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but I like it! I just wish I had really known how to use it!! I know now! I did not realize that the part with the handle came apart! I made my "stuffed" burgers anyway! LOL! And they are delicious! I'm sure I'll get a lot of use from it!
customer_reviews.author: BeBe

customer_reviews.title: This is a small burger maker.
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice, concept is nice, but the size is not. With a five inch diameter, I expected this press to make a decent size burger. This will only make burgers for small, generic type hamberger buns. This press is not large enough to make burgers for gourmet/premium buns which is what we use. Will be returning and looking for a larger press.
customer_reviews.author: M. Canales

customer_reviews.title: glad to have this burger press handy for times when ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely saves a ton of time and effort when it comes to making patties! I tried doing a stuffed patty with pepper jack cheese which was alright, so I'll have to try something else next time. Overall, glad to have this burger press handy for times when I want to make my own!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Work well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than patting the ground beef by hand. It worked extremely well. My burgers were nicely shaped and it barbecued well. During cooking, the burger did lose it's shape but it's only because it shrinks when you cook them.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, exactly what I was looking for! I love that I can use it for sliders too
customer_reviews.author: shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I had to use PAM spray to keep the meat from sticking, not a big deal but i did still have some small problems getting the meat separated from the unit surface. Works best with 1/4 pound of meat
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty decent for regular burgers. We unmake about 1/4 pound burgers. It is not as great as others we have owned. It has a couple attachments but the directions are vague (need a visual) to figure out how to use it. You wouldn’t think a hamburger press would need instructions. The smaller base appears to just a mold.
customer_reviews.author: D's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for sliders or sirloin burgers. Way too small for the rest
customer_reviews.text: This item works really well but unless you want to make sliders or are using 90 percent ground beef the finished product is way to small after cooking. I would be happy to buy the press if it made say 5 1/2 and 6 inch patties. I believe that would accommodate decent sized buns and even single rolls. It does work well having the removable bottom plate for release.
customer_reviews.author: Rich in NY

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this a lot sooner! It makes the perfect burgers and the smaller option to add cheese is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Breeding

customer_reviews.title: just make them by hand...
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try this product and host a little get together. Got annoyed with the burger press a couple patties in and made the rest by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Does as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This vendor ships really fast and did a great job! The product is fun and does exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: GADTX

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easier to be creative and still have the burgers uniform. Thank you! Would buy from seller again
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose Great Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: Works for any round pastry too!!! We use it to make Colombian Arepas (made from Corn Starch). Super handy. Easy to clean. Fits anywhere in your Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Holiday stocking stuffer gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for Christmas as a stocking stuffer. I hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Blanco

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: smoked some blue cheese stuffed burgers and some regular burgers nice size burgers fit the buns nicely
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new burger press
customer_reviews.text: I used this press 4 times already and the burgers came out being the perfect size and are juicy. I have only used the press to make regular burgers without a filling and I loved it! Not too big and not too small. The patties are the perfect size to fit a seeded hamburger bun.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Make perfect burgers every time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use ~ easy to clean. There is nothing like a fresh burger right from the grill. This makes making burgers a breeze. Love the idea of making sliders for the kids attachments make it simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received the wax burger sheets for portioning patties.
customer_reviews.text: Used the hamburger patty press to quickly make patties for a cookout on the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually Impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the price I really didn't expect to much I really just wanted to find a burger press at a decent price. To my surprise this press is easy to use, easy to clean, and makes an amazing stuffed burger. Going to try new stuffed burger recipes at least once a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: Even my husband likes it. Buy it it makes nice size patties. Donna
customer_reviews.author: Donna T.

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect burgers. Even used it to stuff my burgers and they turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayswizz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the burgers I made with this press. Built well and makes a great thick burger
customer_reviews.author: dustin draper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.  easy to use, meat doesn't stick...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. easy to use, meat doesn't stick... I tried another one and that one sucks compared to this one and will not be used any more!
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I hope its what I am assuming as this is a x-mas gift and won't know till 2019
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a grill-master husband!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fun to use, easy clean, great purchase. Husband loved it, I’m sure other husbands and fathers would too! (Anyone who loves burgers really!)
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Burger press
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, works good, way better than hand forming patties. I havent tried the stuffed burger option yet but sure it works great. No instructions included, pretty self-explanatory but some person might have an issue. Nice item 👍
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Piczko

customer_reviews.title: so much easier than doing it by hand
customer_reviews.text: i love this, i used to do it by hand, what a pain. but now i can do it easier and faster...
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really work cheese oozed out watched YouTube video and still couldn't get it to work correctly. Easier to do by hand
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Grat product
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality Product! Best in the market By The Mile!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean Easy to use. Burgers stick to plates . Burgers are way to small. Not impressed with this iten at all.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Robinson

customer_reviews.title: good press for the price
customer_reviews.text: not as heavy duty. but for the price a good press
customer_reviews.author: PIttsburghPete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Secret Santa gift I purchased for a coworker. She is very excited about using it. She said she loves that she can make regular burgers or sliders.
customer_reviews.author: No one special

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Economical
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and economically priced—takes the guessing out of making evenly-sized burgers.
customer_reviews.author: SKGIII

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but just as easy to use your hands. Not really anything special about it
customer_reviews.author: Kim Vitkus

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money to have a great burger, the little attachments is great for Mr 4 year old daughter
customer_reviews.author: milton petree

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking it would make bigger hamburger patties, otherwise it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Hank1130

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and saves time! I buy my hamburger meat in bulk and then freeze them so this is a lifesaver! Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: When I got this I tried making burgers with it. It works great. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: lawanda cochran

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are good. it sticks a little bit, but it is OK
customer_reviews.author: Callebe Trindade Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Took to the lake and it was great to make the burgers all the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product and delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use and a good quality product
customer_reviews.author: Yazan

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the 30 person 4th of july party we had. everyone loved the burgers!

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Just what I needed. No more store bought burgers.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Great product can’t wait to get creative with the stuffing!

customer_reviews.title: Burger press
customer_reviews.text: Every burger came out perfectly and the wax paper made it very easy to separate the burgers.
customer_reviews.author: dragon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it out excellent works perfect everytime didnt even have to spray it or anything

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to figure out initially but with some thought it will come to you.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Ducat

product_meta.title: Non stick Hamburger Press Patty Maker with 30 Wax Paper Discs to Make Regular Burgers, Sliders, Stuffed Burgers and Perfect Patties - Handy Grilling, Barbecue and Kitchen Accessory. Dishwasher safe
product_meta.description:
ARE YOU READY TO ADD THE NEXT STEP TO YOUR GRILLING REPOTOIRE? 

 LET US INTRODUCE YOU TO THE 3 IN 1 BURGER PRESS – GET READY, YOUR PALS WILL BE TALKING ABOUT YOUR HAMBURGERS FOR MONTHS. 

 WE KNOW WHAT YOU NEED IN A BURGER PRESS:

- Easy to use and easy to clean afterwards 

- Plenty of options: sliders have their place in the burger world, as do stuffed burgers and a good ol’ regular hamburger is still a staple 

- Ribbed interior for a classic seared look on the burger 

At No1Cook, we have experimented and trialed and tested until we have settled on the burger press that creates perfection every time. 

Amazon buyers know and trust No1Cook and recognize excellent customer service when they see it. Plus you can feel reassured by our 100% money back guarantee 

 Click "Add to Cart" now and be on your way to burger heaven.
feature_bullets: CONSISTENT DELICIOUS PATTIES EVERY TIME: let the burger press do the work for you and get the same shape and thickness every time making the grilling easy. The interior ribbed finish on the press ensures every patty has the same delicious seared look

YOU CAN CATER FOR EVERYONE: load up the 3 in 1 burger maker with ground beef, ground chicken, ground turkey or a veggie mixture and stuff with cheese, chilli, jalapeno or your own winning combination. From healthy lean burgers topped with fresh salad to the double cheese and bacon beefburger with all the trimmings – you can do it all.

PERFECT GIFT FOR THE GRILLING MAN: Comes in nice packaging and ideal for grill outs, camping, having the boys over, barbeques etc. Great Birthday or Father's Day gift for dad, father in law, partner, son, granddad, boss etc. Great idea for Valentine's Day too.

WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED WITH THE CLEANING - DISHWASHER SAFE: Chill out after cooking, the burger press comes apart and is all dishwasher safe. You can do the prep before your buddies arrive so all you have to do is stand at the grill and enjoy a drink while cooking the burgers.

WE WILL GET YOU STARTED WITH 30 NON STICK PATTY PAPERS: don’t worry about mess and sticking, these wax papers make releasing the burger from the press easy and are great for separating frozen patties.
